Sentencas: Many studies have been conducted for the two-stage solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) module.
Titulo: Electrical Efficiency of Two-Stage Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Stacks with a Fuel Regenerator

Sentencas: Since there are presently no studies for the fuel regenerator's effect on the electrical efficiency of the module to the best of the authors' knowledge, the effect of removing H2O and/or CO(2)was investigated.
Titulo: Electrical Efficiency of Two-Stage Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Stacks with a Fuel Regenerator

Sentencas: To estimate the electrical efficiency, models of the two-stage SOFC stacks with a fuel regenerator that use hydrocarbon or hydrogen fuel were used.
Titulo: Electrical Efficiency of Two-Stage Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Stacks with a Fuel Regenerator

Sentencas: The electrical efficiency was estimated by calculating the maximum fuel utilization rate and the cell voltage.
Titulo: Electrical Efficiency of Two-Stage Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Stacks with a Fuel Regenerator

Sentencas: The risk of carbon deposition from the regenerated anode off-gas was estimated by calculating the chemical equilibrium region of the anode gas.
Titulo: Electrical Efficiency of Two-Stage Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Stacks with a Fuel Regenerator

Sentencas: The maximum electrical efficiency had a net alternating current (AC) of 71.8% (lower heating value (LHV)) from methane fuel.
Titulo: Electrical Efficiency of Two-Stage Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Stacks with a Fuel Regenerator

Sentencas: This was obtained when 100% of the H2O and CO(2)were removed by the fuel regenerator.
Titulo: Electrical Efficiency of Two-Stage Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Stacks with a Fuel Regenerator

Sentencas: In addition, the net AC efficiency of 60.8% (LHV) was obtained from the 10% humidified hydrogen fuel when 98.0% of H2O was removed by the fuel regenerator.
Titulo: Electrical Efficiency of Two-Stage Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Stacks with a Fuel Regenerator

Sentencas: These results suggest a high potential to generate a highly efficient power by the two-stage SOFC stacks with a fuel regenerator.
Titulo: Electrical Efficiency of Two-Stage Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Stacks with a Fuel Regenerator
